content: साक्षिन् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (णी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [सह अक्षि अस्य; साक्षाद् द्रष्टा साक्षी वा <ls>P. V. 2. 91</ls>] {@--1@} Seeing, observing, witnessing. {@--2@} Attesting, testifying. {%--<ab>m.</ab>%} {@--1@} A witness, an observer, an eye-witness; फलं तपःसाक्षिषु दृष्टमेष्वपि <ls>Ku. 5. 60.</ls> {@--2@} The Supreme Being.
